overview: The Devil of Winterborne has only recently been exorcised by PROBE.  But when the body of its last victim disappears, and a book of black magic spells is stolen from a local museum, Liz Shaw begins to wonder if the ghosts of the past have really been laid to rest.  Forced into an unholy alliance with the schoolâ€™s disgraced headmaster, Liz must fight not only her own warring emotions, but a festering evil that threatens to corrupt the Earth again after 100 years.  But how do you fight a shadow from Hell?
title: Ghosts of Winterborne
